more.requirement: Selling & Customer Service: - Maintaining and providing comprehensive product information to customers - Understanding and demonstrating customer care and high level of customer service - Understanding who his/her customers are and proactively respond to their needs - Displaying good listening skills to identify customer needs - Confidently making and closing sales - Looking for cross selling opportunities which will increase basket spend - Processing our customer transactions at the cash desk Merchandising - Replenish stock and maintain high standards of merchandising by ensuring that items are attractively displayed and correctly priced in line with ticketing guidelines - Helping to prepare our season sales - Receiving and processing our deliveries Loss prevention - Following our store routines, policies and guidelines to assist in loss prevention and safety the store Target achievement - Works constantly towards reaching the target
more.description: - Required language(s): English - A friendly and helpful approach to our customers and colleagues - Adhering to company guidelines in personal appearance and rules of conduct - The ability to recognise sales opportunities and maximise selling potential - Flexible with regards to working hours and must be available throughout the week - Candidate must possess at least a College Degree, Marketing, Business Studies/ Administration/ Management, Commerce or equivalent. - No work experience required. - 4 Full-Time position(s) available.
